question: You have recently moved to a different house, and you want to give the news to an English-speaking friend who lives in another country.Write a letter to this English-speaking friend. In your letter,explain why you have moveddescribe the new houseinvite your friend to come and visit
text: I hope you are doing amazing .Hope this letter finds you in radiant health and the best of spirits .I am pleased to tell you that I have recently shifted to a new but in a different city.

As you must know that I was working as a Junior Lecturer at Government Dental College. Last month,  I got an opportunity to work as an assistant professor in college but in another city. In fact,  you know that I was waiting for such a type of opportunity for a long time.

After accepting the offer,  I shifted from Chandigarh to Amritsar. Luckily,  I owned an amazing house at an affordable rate. It is a two-story brick house in the model town colony of Amritsar. There is an amazing kitchen garden on the backside. Moreover,  my house is a five-minute distance from my workplace.

I would like to invite you to visit me at my new house. It has been so long to see you after our graduation in China. Whenever you plan to visit let me know beforehand so that I could make all arrangements regarding your stay.
Hoping to see you soon. Convey regards to parents.
